Package neuroEvo

Class Population

java.lang.Object
neuroEvo.Population
public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the list of Genomes to comprise the "Population"
This class will be the one instantiated in Client Code when implementing this algorithm It is responsible for managing each individual Genome and performing the evolve process of breeding and mutating new generations
Author:
Caleb Devon
Created 7/11/2021

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Gene> LIST_OF_KNOWN_GENES
    Used as a global counter for all genes that have existed in the population's history

  • Field Details

    • LIST_OF_KNOWN_GENES

      protected java.util.ArrayList<Gene> LIST_OF_KNOWN_GENES
      Used as a global counter for all genes that have existed in the population's history

  • Constructor Details

    • Population

      public Population​(int inputs, int outputs, int size, boolean top2)
      Parameters:
      inputs - The size of the input layer
      outputs - The size of the output layer
      size - How many Genomes to create
      top2 - If true, breeding process will only consider the top 2 performing Genomes as parents

  • Method Details

    • getPopulation

      public GenomeNet[] getPopulation()
      Used by the Client to get the whole population array
      Returns:
      The population array

    • getGenome

      public GenomeNet getGenome​(int index)
      Used by the client to get a specific Genome
      Parameters:
      index - specific Genome Index
      Returns:
      Returns the Genome array item at a given index

    • calculate

      public double[][] calculate​(double[][] inputs)
      Used to calculate a whole list of calculations at once
      Parameters:
      inputs - 2 dimensional array of inputs for the whole population
      Returns:
      2 dimensional array for the outputs of the whole population

    • breed

      public void breed()
      This method is called by the client typically at the end of a generation's scoring

    • getGeneration

      public int getGeneration()
      Get the generation number
      Returns:
      Returns the current generation number

    • getHighestFitness

      public GenomeNet getHighestFitness()
      Can be called in client code to get the Generation's highest performing Genome
      Returns:
      Best Genome of this generation

    • testGeneticDiversity

      public void testGeneticDiversity()
      Test Method for determining the Genetic makeup of a generation

    • getHighestIndex

      public int getHighestIndex()
      Gets the Index of the Highest Performing Genome
      Returns:
      Genome Index

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Getter for Population Size
      Returns:
      Population size

    • setStMutationRates

      public void setStMutationRates​(double[] mutationRates)
      Setter for the initial mutation rates
      Parameters:
      mutationRates - array of values between 0 and 1 to represent a chance of mutation

      Array Size must be 5
      If this method is not used, the default values will be used

    • setFnMutationRates

      public void setFnMutationRates​(double[] mutationRates)
      Setter for the final mutation rates
      Parameters:
      mutationRates - array of values between 0 and 1 to represent a chance of mutation

      Array Size must be 5
      If this method is not used, the default values will be used

    • setComplexMutationRates

      public void setComplexMutationRates​(double[] mutationRates)
      Setter for the complex mutation rates
      Parameters:
      mutationRates - array of values between 0 and 1 to represent a chance of mutation

      Array Size must be 2
      If this method is not used, the default values will be used
